com.jidesoft.grid
Interface ExpandableRow

All Superinterfaces:
Expandable, Node, Row
All Known Subinterfaces:
GanttEntry<T>, MutableGanttEntry<T>, SubEntryGanttEntry<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractExpandableRow, AbstractGroupRow, BeanProperty, ChildBeanProperty, DefaultExpandableRow, DefaultGanttEntry, DefaultGroupRow, DefaultProperty, Property, RootExpandableRow
public interface ExpandableRow
extends Expandable, Row

ExpandableRow combines expandable and row. It is used to implement TreeTable.
